snippet: The Montreal Forum was the Canadiens' home for one of the most successful dynasties in professional sports....
lead_paragraph: The Montreal Forum was the Canadiens' home for one of the most successful dynasties in professional sports.

headline.main: Winter Classic: Canadiens Top Bruins 5-1 at Home of Patriots
